name: Meltdown Madness
description:
This is a 2d platformer game made in LÖVE2D framework using Lua as the scripting language. The main plot is based on the theme "Meltdown". The Ice is melting fast and the water is rising rapidly. You need to climb your way up to survive!

Take control of the player by pressing "a" to go left , "d" to go right and "space" to jump to safety.

Hint: All platforms are climbable.
(You need to figure it out :D)
